description: Indicates if the payment has bounced for the current month (1 for bounce, 0 for no bounce).
name: Net_Bounce_Flag

description: The month on book from the installment start date. For example, a value of 1 indicates the account's first EMI month.
name: MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE

description: Indicates if the customer has completed 3 months on the book (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_3M_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 0+ days past due in the last 3 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_3M_EVER_0PLUS_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has completed 6 months on the book (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_6M_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 30+ days past due in the last 6 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_6M_EVER_30PLUS_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has completed 12 months on the book (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_12M_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 30+ days past due in the last 12 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_12M_EVER_30PLUS_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 60+ days past due in the last 12 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_12M_EVER_60PLUS_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 90+ days past due in the last 6 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_6M_EVER_90PLUS_Flag

description: The zone of the branch.
name: BRANCH_ZONE

description: The zone of the customer.
name: CUST_ZONE

description: The overall recurring payment due.
name: RC_DUE_OVERALL

description: The overall recurring payment pending.
name: RC_PENDING_OVERALL

description: Last year's Principal Outstanding - the current remaining principal balance on the loan.
name: LY_POS

description: Indicates if the customer was 1-30 days past due last year (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_1_30_LY_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer was 30-60 days past due last year (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_30_60_LY_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer was 60-90 days past due last year (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_60_90_LY_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has slipped from 0 days past due last year to 90+ days past due currently (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_0LY_90PLUSCurrent_SLIPPAGE_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has slipped from 1-30 days past due last year to 90+ days past due currently (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_1_30LY_90PLUSCurrent_SLIPPAGE_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has slipped from 31-60 days past due last year to 90+ days past due currently (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_31_60LY_90PLUSCurrent_SLIPPAGE_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has slipped from 61-90 days past due last year to 90+ days past due currently (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Delinquency_61_90LY_90PLUSCurrent_SLIPPAGE_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 0+ days past due in the last 6 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_6M_EVER_0PLUS_Flag

description: Gross Non-Starter for 4th EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 4th month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 4.
name: FMI_GNS4

description: The score from the Early Warning System model.
name: EWS_Model_Score

description: The output band from the Early Warning System model. CRITICAL RULE: For analysis, you MUST use a CASE statement to group the raw values into these exact three bands, ordered from lowest to highest risk: 'Low' (for values R1-R3), 'Medium' (for values R4-R7), and 'High' (for values R8-R10 and above).
name: EWS_Model_Output_Band

description: Indicates if the loan was disbursed in the last 3 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: Last3M_Disbursed_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 90+ days past due in the last 12 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: MOB_12M_EVER_90PLUS_Flag

description: The financial loss amount associated with the Principal Outstanding.
name: POS_LOSS

description: Indicates if the customer is risky in the last 6 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: RISK_MOB_6M_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer is risky in the last 12 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: RISK_MOB_12M_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 30+ days past due in the last 6 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: RISK_MOB_6M_EVER_30PLUS_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 30+ days past due in the last 12 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: RISK_MOB_12M_EVER_30PLUS_Flag

description: Indicates if the customer has been 90+ days past due in the last 12 months (1 for yes, 0 for no).
name: RISK_MOB_12M_EVER_90PLUS_Flag

description: Unique identifier for the loan agreement, typically an alphanumeric code.
name: AGREEMENTNO

description: The unique numeric identifier for the agreement.
name: AGREEMENTID

description: Status of the loan at the start of month.
name: SOM_STATUS

description: The number of days past due at the start of the month.
name: SOM_DPD

description: Indicates the DPD (Days Past Due) bucket of the customer as of the start of the current month. CRITICAL RULE: For analysis, you MUST use these exact buckets: '0', '1-2', '3-5', '6-10', and '11+'.
name: SOM_DPD_BUCKET

description: The EMI outstanding at the start of the month.
name: SOM_EMIDEBTOR

description: The book size at the start of the month.
name: SOM_BOOKSIZE

description: The outstanding overdue charges at the start of the month.
name: SOM_ODCDEBTORS

description: The cheque bounce charges outstanding at the start of the month.
name: SOM_CBCDEBTORS

name: SOM_TOTAL_CHARGES_DUE

description: The total overdue amount at the start of the month.
name: SOM_TOTAL_OD_AMT

description: The principal outstanding at the start of the month.
name: SOM_PRINCIPALDEBTOR

description: The interest outstanding at the start of the month.
name: SOM_INTERESTDEBTOR

description: Indicates if the customer is currently delinquent at the start of the month ('Y'/'N').
name: SOM_DELIQUENT_FLAG

description: Unique identifier for the branch where the loan was originated.

description: Indicates if the loan has matured ('Y'/'N').

description: Name of the dealer or supplier from whom the vehicle was purchased.

description: Indicates if the customer is currently delinquent ('Y'/'N').

name: GNS1

description: Net Non-Starter for 1st EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 1st month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 1.
name: NNS1

description: Gross Non-Starter for 2nd EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 2nd month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 2.
name: GNS2

description: Net Non-Starter for 2nd EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 2nd month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 2.
name: NNS2

description: Gross Non-Starter for 3rd EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: This is only valid for accounts in their 3rd month. Any calculation MUST be filtered for MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 3.

description: Identifies a Net Non-Starter (NNS), where a customer fails to pay their first EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: Any calculation using this FMI_NNS column (count, percentage, etc.) MUST be filtered for accounts where MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 1.
name: FMI_NNS

description: Identifier to determine if the customer has not paid the second EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: Any calculation using this column MUST be filtered for accounts where MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 2.
name: SMI_NNS

description: Identifier to determine if the customer has not paid the third EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: Any calculation using this column MUST be filtered for accounts where MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 3.
name: TMI_NNS3

description: Identifies if a customer bounced on their first EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: Any calculation involving GNS (count, percentage, etc.) MUST be filtered for accounts where MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 1. This column is ONLY valid for first EMI cases.
name: FMI_GNS

description: Identifier to determine if the customer has bounced in the second EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: Any calculation using this column MUST be filtered for accounts where MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 2.
name: SMI_GNS

description: Identifier to determine if the customer has bounced in the third EMI ('Y'/'N'). CRITICAL RULE: Any calculation using this column MUST be filtered for accounts where MOB_ON_INSTL_START_DATE = 3.
name: TMI_GNS3
